item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 23 Apr 2024
item.description:
1. A second beta for OCaml 5.2.0
  2. An implementation of purely functional double-ended queues
  3. Feedback / Help Wanted: Upcoming OCaml.org Cookbook Feature
  4. Picos â€” Interoperable effects based concurrency
  5. Ppxlib dev meetings
  6. Ortac 0.2.0
  7. OUPS meetup april 2024
  8. Mirage 4.5.0 released
  9. patricia-tree 0.9.0 - library for patricia tree based maps and sets
  10. OCANNL 0.3.1: a from-scratch deep learning (i.e. dense tensor optimization) framework
  11. Other OCaml News
